DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine influence moderate FiO2 lung protective ventilation postoperative pulmonary complication follow hepatic resection surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Moderate Inspired Oxygen Fraction ( FiO2 ) Protective Ventilation Postoperative Pulmonary Complication
DOC.criteria: ASA 1~2 , Planned intrabdominal hepatic resection surgery ; Expected duration 2 hour 6 hour ; Age 40 yr 70 yr ) ; BMI 1826.9kg/m2 Risk postoperative pulmonary complication ( Arozullah score ≥2 ) ; Noninvasive ventilation last 30 day ; Recent history pneumonia , ALI/ARDS ( last 30 day ) ; History pulmonary resection ; History neuromuscular disease ; ChildPugh > A grade； Patient refusal ;
